analysis.description:
Crowdsale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/46/0x4021e315e76dabb392056bdde69676eabfb35116.sol#120-133) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-atomToken.mint(beneficiary,tokens) (/unique_chucks/46/0x4021e315e76dabb392056bdde69676eabfb35116.sol#131)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/46/0x4021e315e76dabb392056bdde69676eabfb35116.sol:
